title: Hanging, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: split, satin, stem and couching stitches on 5-harness satin
description: Fragment from a hanging embroidered in multicolored silk and metallic thread on an orange ground. The design shows a European coat of arms set in a curving flowering vine with birds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 18th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: split, satin, stem and couching stitches on 5-harness satin. 1975-52-3.
